definition: A phrase commonly used to express well wishes for someone's health and to convey hopes for their speedy recovery from an illness or injury. It is often used in social interactions, such as when visiting someone in the hospital or sending a get-well card.

examples.english: Warm health wishes for your birthday!

examples.german: Ich sende dir meine besten Gesundheitswünsche.
examples.english: I send you my best health wishes.

examples.german: Viele Gesundheitswünsche für die kommenden Jahre!
examples.english: Many health wishes for the years to come!

examples.german: Ich hoffe, dass du bald wieder gesund wirst.
examples.english: I hope you get well soon.
